name: SIZER (Cabezotta)
description:
JAM VERSION 1 | Game made for #7DFPS

SIZER: Change the size of your body.By Nicolás Recabarren. (@cabezotta)
Mendoza. Argentina. 2020.

With sound effects from various sources: steps sfx made by Tomás Batista. The rest from freesounds.org and edited by me.

Character and animations from mixamo.com.

Made with Unity (2019.4.0f1).
Using Universal Render Pipeline.
With additional assets: DOTween, KinematicCharacterController, ToDoList.
